s3.ptxt: Check that all doors lock when the door control switch (for manual operation) LOCK side is pressed, and that all doors unlock when the UNLOCK side is pressed.

Check that all doors lock when the driver side door lock key cylinder is turned to LOCK using the key. However, the driver side door key-linked lock and unlock function will not operate when the seat belt is fastened.

s2.ptxt: Check the speed-sensitive automatic door lock function and ignition switch-linked automatic door unlock function.

s3.ptxt: When all doors are closed and the vehicle is driven at approximately 25 km/h (16 mph) or more for the first time, check that all doors automatically lock.

atten4.ptxt: The automatic door lock function described above will not operate again until a door has been opened and closed.

s3.ptxt: After a speed-sensitive automatic door lock function operates, check that turning the ignition switch OFF causes the doors to automatically unlock.
